title: People with mental health issues, what are your go to songs for your disorder? Which ones express your disorder or its symptoms the best? - Quora

response.answer_text: I generally listen to whole albums instead of individual songs, so I list those. Sad Depression: “Woods of Desolation - Torn Beyond Reason” Angered Depression: “Mgla - With Hearts Towards None” Depersonalization: “Gorgoroth - Pentagram” Anxiety: “Death - Spiritual Healing” ADHD: “Inquisition - Ominous Doctrines of the Perpetual Mystical Macrocosm”
Dirty Creature by Split Enz. Is about panic attacks. Down in a Hole by Alice in Chains- Depression Fell On Black Days- Soundgarden- Depression
